NF.Q: Between which pairs of nodes in column Factory and column Assembly is the flow between 163 and 201? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Chemical Plant to node Quality Check and from node Regional Warehouse A to node Auto Factory, which path has a larger flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Chemical Plant} to node {Quality Check} is larger.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Food Processing Plant to node Test Facility and from node Regional Warehouse A to node Auto Factory, which path has a larger flow?

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Central Warehouse to node Food Processing Plant, from node Chemical Plant to node Component Assembly, and from node Electronics Plant to node Test Facility, which path has the largest flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Electronics Plant} to node {Test Facility} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which node in the column Warehouse of the sankey chart is the most critical?

MSR.Q: What is the path with the highest total flow from source node Central Warehouse to target node Labeling? Please list all node labels along this path.
